title: Educational Storytelling Design Utilizing Film Production Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing storytelling techniques applicable to language education settings for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the narrative structure of film production and design three storytelling frames applicable to educational content.
Learners can produce a 5-minute mini-storyboard for language learning using visual and auditory techniques of video media.
Learners can explain two emotional design strategies (e.g., climax placement, character empathy elements) to stimulate learner engagement during story development.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
